article: October 7th Dear Liu Qi . I ' m writing to tell you that the students of our school are planning to go for a school trip to Beijing near the end of this month , from October 20thto 27th . I ' d like to invite you to come and join us . I remember you told me that you liked travelling . We ' ll visit many places of interest . Such as the Great Wall , the Palace Museum and the Summer Palace . If it does n ' t rain , we ' ' also go camping at the foot of the Great Wall . We ' ll stay at the Beijing Holidday Village . During these days , we ' ll have parties . At the parties , the students will sing , dance and play games together . Would you please write back to let me know if you come ? We need to buy the train tickets ahead of time . I ' m looking forward to hearing from you soon . Yours , Lin Yun
